monthly_regional_data.oceanographic_summary: 2013-01 data from Arabian Sea shows average temperatures of 17.7°C and salinity of 35.9. Deep water measurements extend to 2001m depth.
2013-01 data from Bay of Bengal shows average temperatures of 14.8°C and salinity of 34.3. Deep water measurements extend to 1999m depth.
2013-01 data from Equatorial Region shows average temperatures of 13.9°C and salinity of 34.9. Deep water measurements extend to 2028m depth.
2013-01 data from Indian Ocean shows average temperatures of 9.9°C and salinity of 34.8. Deep water measurements extend to 3290m depth. Cool waters suggest high latitude or deep water influence.
